annotations.source_heading: AMAZINGLY UPDATED CONDO FOR RENT! MUST SEE KITCHEN!3 BD! EUROPEAN INSP

postings.heading: AMAZINGLY UPDATED CONDO FOR RENT MUST SEE KITCHEN3 BD EUROPEAN INSP

postings.body:
******* Our cottage is before the Bourne and Sagamore bridges Cape Cod Bridges!!
******* VACATION ON THE GATEWAY OF CAPE COD, VACATION WITHOUT THE CROWDS IN OUR GEM HOUSE, LOCATED IN WAREHAM, MA.****
***PRIME PRIME AREA, A HIDDEN GEM, A PIECE OF PARADISE****
These are the weeks that are still available:
August 9 - August 16
August 30 - September 6
September 6 - September 13
September 13 - September 20
September 20 - September 27
****** FANTASTIC RATE OF 1,600 A WEEK!!!
****** We pride ourselves in this vacation destination. It is clean, children and family friendly, and pet friendly.
***** This house is located in a very private exclusive area, in buzzards Bay. It is located in the town of Wareham, the gateway to Cape Cod.
**** The house is located a hundred yards from the ocean. Less then a minute walk to the beach!
*****This 3 bedroom house is nautically furnished and SLEEPS 7-9 PEOPLE COMFORTABLY!!
*****HOUSE DESCRIPTION:
Bedroom #1: King size bed and pull out twin couch,
Bedroom #2: 2 twin Beds. ,
Bedroom #3: double bed and twin bed All beds have nice clean bed linens.
****** The skylit Kitchen has a big refrigerator, a stove, a microwave, toaster, coffee maker, toaster oven, and fully stocked with utensils, dish ware, and cook ware. The kitchen table seats six. Also there is a unique bar area for extra seating.
******* Living room has a pull out couch for additional sleeping, a wood stove, and a book shelf filled with books for pleasure reading. Also a collection of board games and cards.
******* The Television in the living room is a flat screen 34 inch equipped with Comcast television and quality channels. There is a DVD player as well as a collection of DVDs.
******* There is free high speed internet WIFI connection for all wireless computer devises.
******* Bathroom has a full bath. We provide a supply of wash towels, toilet paper, soap. Also an ironing board and iron.
******* Laundry is on site. There is a washing machine and dryer.
***** Great fenced in backyard with a six foot cape cod fence offering privacy.
***** There is plenty of room to entertain as the back yard features a big patio, barbecue gas grill, and outdoor furniture.
***** Also there is an outdoor shower for beach days.
***** And there is plenty of room for parking. There is a large front yard.
***** OCEAN: There is a private beach, and also the public Harbor Beach a short one minute walk away. The beach has quiet crowds. You can walk the beach for miles, find unique seashells, enjoy low and high tides, plenty of space to play in the sand. Beautiful sunsets each night. Bring your kayaks, wind surfing gear, and boat (launching area five minutes from house).
***** DO YOU LOVE TO PLAY GOLF? The house sits on the public Little harbor Golf Course (http://www.littleharborcountryclub.com). We provide a set of golf clubs for your use.
***** This area is filled with many pleasure seeking opportunities.
***** BRING YOUR BIKES! The neighborhood is great for biking, with designated bike trails behind the golf course. Bring your bikes down to the Cape Cod Canal and ride them for miles along the canal.
****** TOWNS NEAR OUR WAREHAM HOUSE: Onset, Bourne, Marion, Mattapoisett, Sandwich.
****** RESTAURANTS: There is many fantastic restaurants within ten minutes. Get the best fried seafood at the local Captain Al`s Restaurant, eat Lobster in the rough at Eastwind Lobster, or the best clam chowder at The Lobster Pot. Other great restaurants include The well known Mezza Luna, Lindsey`s, Ella`s Brick Oven, or Baileys. Also there are many breakfast places to enjoy including Percy`s, Leo`s, the Cranberry Cottage, and the Crack O` dawn.
* SHOPPING: The house is close to shopping and grocery centers (10 minutes). One shopping plaza can be reviewed here: (http://www.warehamcrossing.com). Antique shopping close by.
* FUN VACATION IDEAS IN THE AREA: The best water park in the Cape Cod area is right in Wareham and is called, Water Wizz Water Park (http://www.waterwizz.com). There is Mini Golf, go-carts, baseball batting cages, candle pin bowling, a butterfly garden, ice cream shops, and kayak/canoe rentals, Canal ferry rides, all within 15 minutes of the house.
*Also wareham, is the capital for cranberry bogs and you can enjoy them year round and fresh organic farm produce at this farm (http://www.makepeacefarms.com) in wareham.
* It only takes 1 hour in driving time from Boston.
* It is only half hour car ride to the ferry. So you can spend a day on Martha`s Vineyard or Nantucket.
******* CALL TODAY TO BOOK YOUR VACATION!!
